channel.title: Whispering a dead person goes to public chat
channel.description:
#### What happened?
If you type "/w 3 mumble", and 3 is dead, then the text "/w 3 mumble" gets posted in public chat
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
An error message would be reasonable.
#### Steps to reproduce:
#### Comments:
Publishing what I thought was a private message is pretty sucky.

item.title: Whispering a dead person goes to public chat
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Accidents happen. I’ve made this mistake myself sometimes.

Read full topic
